setEffects.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

flower.name: Thundersoother's Heart
flower.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

plume.name: Thundersoother's Plume
plume.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

sands.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
sands.desc: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

goblet.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
goblet.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

circlet.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
circlet.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.
